name: Inquisitor (itch) (MasterDataBase)
description:
An Early access game, at the moment the story of this game is under development.

This game will be a short investigation story.

This game is a collaboration with @Giulia Levada

any tips or suggestion will be accepted.

P.S.

Maybe some anti-virus will raise a red flag, I know it's weired but go on and ignore it as usual.
